title.rendered: Spandan 4.0 – India’s best selling 12 Lead ECG device

content.rendered:
Spandan 4.0

The revolutionary portable ECG device

Shop Now
Book a Free Demo

COMPACT & PORTABLE

ECG on Smartphone

Spandan Legacy redefines portability in ECG technology, enabling high-quality ECGs on smartphones. Weighing only 12 grams, its compact design greatly enhances cardiac assessments for both doctors and patients.

PRECISION IN EVERY BEAT

99.7% Accuracy

Spandan has an exceptional accuracy of 99.7%, guaranteeing precise results consistently. This accurate data acquisition is instrumental in timely detection and crafting effective treatment plans.

ALWAYS READY

No Battery or Internet

Spandan operates without the need for a battery, charging, or internet connection, ensuring it’s always ready for comprehensive cardiac evaluations. This feature makes it an effective tool for remote, rural, or non-internet locations.

NEW AGE ANALYSIS

Heart Risk Meter

Spandan includes a Heart Risk Meter feature, allowing users to assess their heart risk based on basic medical information. It provides indications of low, medium, or high risk, aiding in the understanding of one’s heart condition and initiating treatment if necessary.

REAL-TIME OBSERVATION

Live ECG Monitoring

Spandan Neo is set to redefine ECG technology with its innovative design, upgraded features, and user-friendly controls. It offers convenience like never before, making it easier for healthcare professionals and patients to monitor cardiac activity accurately.

1 TAP REPORT GENERATION

Personalised Reports

Spandan’s application generates detailed reports instantly, providing precise and user-friendly information on the user’s cardiac condition. These reports offer comprehensive insights and can be conveniently saved and shared in PDF format or printed on A4 sheets.

Preferred By

100+

Doctors

500+

Users

500+

Business

Know When to Use Spandan

Unclear Symptoms

Find out immediately if your symptoms need to be treated or not.

Heart Attack

Avoid additional damage following a heart attack by performing regular checks.

Arrhythmias

Recognize recurrent symptoms after being treated for an arrhythmia and prevent stroke.

Prevention

Keep your cardiac risk, whether from increasing age or a familial predisposition, in check.

How to take ECG with Spandan

Watch Full Video
Watch Full Video

Access Medical-Grade ECG Tests on Smartphone

Spandan ECG offers advanced medical-grade ECG tests on your smartphone. Detect blockages, arrhythmias, take real-time ECG and Hyperkalemia test, and check stress and anxiety levels

  • 12 Lead ECG
  • Lead ll ECG
  • HRV
  • Hyperkalemia
  • Live Monitor

12 Lead ECG

The Spandan Portable ECG device uses no battery and derives power from the mobile it is connected to. No internet is required for our ECG app for smartphones, either.
Learn More
Sample Report

Lead II ECG

Detect and measure the rhythm of the heart. This test is primarily used to diagnose various patterns of arrhythmia.

Learn More
Sample Report

HRV

The Heart Rate Variability test interprets the variation in heart rate. It also allows you to track your stress and anxiety levels.

Learn More
Sample Report

Hyperkalemia

This test aids in the detection of hyperkalemia, a medical condition characterized by elevated levels of potassium in the blood.

Learn More
Sample Report

Live Monitor

Monitor your heart health in real-time. Gain valuable information about the rhythm, rate, and overall cardiac health of your heart.

Learn More

Abnormalities

Reviews and Testimonials

Dr. K. Borg
I am a Pulmonologist by profession. I have a very positive experience with the Spandan ECG machine. Its user-friendly design and portability makes it a convenient choice, especially for physicians in rural areas. The commendable support from the Spandan team for reporting complex ECGs adds significant value to the product. Overall, it sounds like a reliable tool for healthcare professionals on the go.
Dr. Pushkaraj Vaishampayan
I find it very portable and easy to carry in my visit bag for home visits. I have recommended it to my patients who are having heart problems so that they can take an ECG immediately, if they are having any symptoms and send it to me for further treatment plan through WhatsApp. Thank you sunfox for this wonderful machine.
Sagar Deb
I found the product very useful and accurate reading was provided.Customer support also helped me with the demo session.Overall great experience.Definitely recommended the product.Thank you
Maher Deep Singh Bedi
It is a really good product for heart patient. The company people also give free demo. The company people are very polite. I liked the product very much.
Pravin Rangari
Fantastic, Just Superb ,Very Simple,Can be Taken In Pocket,ECG Can Be Done anywhere anytime,All instructions are Displayed on the Android Phone ,On the Screen ,Very Well Demo Given
Dr.Suresh Kubavat
Its beautiful handy device. Specially a must in your bag when you are travelling to remote places and you have or have possibility of cardiac problem, specially elderly and people with Diabetes, Hypertension. I have used it and found it quite accurate. Thanks Sunfox technology.

Frequently Asked Questions

How will I get the interpretation from Sunfox Spandan ECG 4.0?.

The ECG device has three electrode cables the red electrode is connected to the right arm, the green electrode is connected to the left arm, and the yellow electrodes need to be positioned from V1 to V6, Lead I, and Lead II

Who all can use Spandan ECG 4.0?

Spandan ECG 4.0 device can be used by everyone — from cardiologists, general practitioners, non-experts seeking cardiac monitoring at home. This user-friendly heart monitor is a must-have, particularly for emergencies, ensuring timely diagnosis.

Is Spandan ECG 4.0 a good choice for clinics?

SpandanECG 4.0 is a medical-grade portable ECG machine, making it a reliable choice for doctors due to its outstanding features, user-friendly app and affordability. Providing automated interpretation and delivering instant results on smartphone.

Which all tests Spandan ECG 4.0 can perform?

Spandan ECG 4.0 can perform 12-Lead for detecting blockages , Lead 2 to detect arrhythmia, Live monitoring for real-time heart monitoring, and Heart Rate Variability Test (HRV) to assess heart rate, stress levels, anxiety.

I am not a Medical person. How can I understand the ECG graphical representation?

Spandan ECG ensures that its reports are accessible to everyone, even those without a medical background. The graphical representations are designed to be simple and easily understandable for all. Any non-expert can use the device conveniently.

Take the First Step Towards a Healthy Heart

*Spandan is currently available for Android Users only.
